titles.title: A resolution supporting the designation of September as "National Atrial Fibrillation Awareness Month" and encouraging efforts to educate the public about atrial fibrillation.
A resolution supporting the designation of September as "National Atrial Fibrillation Awareness Month" and encouraging efforts to educate the public about atrial fibrillation.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Expresses support for the designation of September as National Atrial Fibrillation Awareness Month.
Recognizes the need for additional research into treatment for atrial fibrillation.
